attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned hereby approve of the changes that happened in Egypt following the Egyptian people demand in June 2013, the Muslim Brotherhood group have managed to steer propaganda to divide the Egyptians and are leading the country to the unknown.
We are rather concerned about what the future hold for Egypt, the UK have always had a historical relationship with Egypt and believe in the role that Egypt can play to achieve stability in the Middle East, that is why we believe that the UK government should do their utmost to convince the MBH to come to the negotiating table and put some more pressure on group leaders’ to achieve a practical solution for this crises known the UK government hold a significant relation with the Muslim Brother hood Group.
